title: The Fruit of the Spirit: Patience
description:
Readings from:

Psalms 37:7-9; 40:1-3

Proverbs 14:29

1 Corinthians 13:4

James 5:7-8

Today's passages were read by Erin Straza, communications consultant, managing editor for Christ and Pop Culture, co-host of the Persuasion podcast, and author of Comfort Detox: Finding Freedom from Habits That Bind You.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
